Ferocity

Benefit

2

Whenever you use the Knockback maneuver, the forced movement distance gains a bonus equal to your Agility score.

4

The first time you slide a creature on a turn, you gain 1 surge.

6

You gain an edge on Agility tests and the Knockback maneuver.

8 (4th level)

The first time you slide a creature on a turn, you gain 2 surges.

10 (7th level)

You have a double edge on Agility tests and the Knockback maneuver.

12 (10th level)

Whenever you use a heroic ability, you gain 10 temporary Stamina. Additionally, whenever you make a power roll that imposes forced movement on a target, the forced movement distance gains a bonus equal to your Agility score.
